Generated Narrative: ValueSet eHDSIBodySiteWithExceptions

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in eHDSI Exceptional Value
  • Import all the codes that are contained in eHDSI Body Site

name: EHDSIBodySiteWithExceptions
title: eHDSI Body Site with exceptions
description:
The Value Set is used for the details about the anatomical location of a specimen in the Laboratory Result Report or the target body location of a procedure in the Patient Summary.
It includes also exceptional values.
